動物用藥品名稱: 富道雞新城病、傳染性支氣管炎不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 美商惠氏藥廠(亞洲)股份有限公司台灣分公司

ingredients: NEWCASTLE DISEASE STRAIN KIMBER, VIRUS-BEARING FLUIDS(10^7.9EID50/DOSE) (BEFORE INACTIVATION) 0.050ML; BRONCHITIS STRAIN H-52, VIRUS-BEARING FLUIDS(10^6.9EID50/DOSE) (BEFORE INACTIVATION) 0.050ML;BRONCHITIS STRAIN M-41, VIRUS-BEARING FLUIDS(10^6.9EID50/DOSE)(BEFORE INACTIVATION) 0.050ML; FORMALIN 0.001ML;WHITE OIL 0.326ML;ARLACEL-83 0.020ML; TWEEN-80 0.003ML.
